title: SideGuy Senior Edition
description: Trusted help for seniors in San Diego — tech help, errands, insurance navigation, rides, and real human support.
subhead: The trusted senior support network for San Diego families.
content: Welcome to SideGuy Senior Edition — the human-first solution for everyday senior problems. Trusted, fast, and always here.

title: Help With Medicare Bills
description: Help understanding Medicare EOBs, bills, charges, copays, and statements.
content: SideGuy helps seniors and families understand Medicare bills, EOBs, copays, denied claims, and more.
